title: What do these lines in Eternal Flame mean, “Close your eyes, give me your hand, do you feel my heart beating, do you understand, do you feel the same, am I only dreaming, is this burning an eternal flame”? - Quora

response.answer_text: What do these lines in Eternal Flame mean, “Close your eyes, give me your hand, do you feel my heart beating, do you understand, do you feel the same, am I only dreaming, is this burning an eternal flame”? My personal interpretation is that they're telling a person that they love them (heart beating) and asking if they love them too. They then ask if the love is real (am I dreaming) and if the feeling will last forever (eternal flame). But hey!? What do I know? Addendum: Okay. Now that I've actually listened to the song, I have to stick with my original interpretation. I agree with myself. It’s about love.
